mapper.select: select C.name,format(sum(A.use_cost),0) saveCost from t_use_list as A inner join t_monthly_goal as B on A.goal_id=B.goal_id inner join t_not_todo as C on C.not_todo_id=B.not_todo_id where cost_category = 1 and date between DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 7 DAY)and now() and member_id=#{memberId} group by name
